programme.title: Berita Alhijrah (L)
programme.desc: Berita Utama Tv-Alhijrah terbahagi kepada beberapa segmen iaitu Berita Utama Harian, Berita Luar Negara, Laporan Khas, sukan, ramalan cuaca, saham and ekonomi.

programme.title: Jalan Ke Syurga
programme.desc: Razak dan Meriam hartawan yang hidup dalam kejahilan. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak, Syamsul yang juga tidak mengamalkan hidup Islam.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 19
programme.desc: (Encore) A USC gynecologist is accused of sexually abusing more than 300 young women for nearly 30 years; Montel Williams' recent health scare.

programme.title: Code Of Law - EP 3
programme.desc: A former psychologist casually suffocates his wife to death and then calls the police himself. His alibi - a 'friend' called Ah Boy told him to do it. Both the investigators and the defence team realize they may have met their match in a suspect, and client, who can manipulate and hit them where it hurts emotionally. Is Mr Tay really crazy, or is he just faking it to avoid the gallows?

programme.title: The Simpsons 29 - EP 11
programme.desc: Professor Frink is tasked with determining who is worth saving from doomsday.

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud S4b - EP 2
programme.desc: The funniest videos on the internet, guaranteed to Make You Laugh Out Loud. This show celebrates the amazing wealth of talented and funny animals and people to be found on the internet. Featuring the best UGC from around the world, behavioural experts and other comedy talent providing a commentary into the world of LOL.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 9
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 2
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 33
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Ali Wong (book, "Dear Girls") and Dr Mehmet Oz ("The Dr. Oz Show"). Ten-year-old magician Aidan McCann from Ireland returns to perform a few new tricks.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: Rusty Knight - EP 17
programme.desc: In Scrapland, the characters have all been put together from various recycled household utensils. They devote their unique talents to getting ex-cash register Knight Rusty out of trouble, who thinks he's the bravest, coolest knight in all of Scrapland (but he's really a show-off with a big mouth).

programme.title: Coconut The Little Dragon S1 - EP 29
programme.desc: Fire Dragon Coconut, Gourmet Dragon Oscar and porcupine Matilda are always up for adventure! Life is not always easy on Dragon Island - Coconut has flying problems, Oscar is the only vegetarian in his family and Matilda has no say as a porcupine on Dragon Island anyway. Attention-Deficit-Hyperactivity Disorder (AD-HD) is a condition that can make it hard for a person to sit still, control behavior, and pay attention. These difficulties usually begin before the person is 7 years old. However, these behaviors may not be noticed until the child is older.There are three main signs, or symptoms, of AD-HD. They are- problems with paying attention, being very active (called hyperactivity), and acting before thinking (called impulsivity). In this episode we will feature a family with a child who has ADHD. The child was diagnosed with ADHD when he was at school-going age. Family share how he was diagnosed, the challenges before and after the diagnosis and how they have come up with ways to help him cope with school and at home.

Tashriq goes alone to Zainab’s house to ask about Alysa and Sofiya. He comes back home and agrees to marry Riena much to Khadijah’s surprised.

programme.title: J.K.K S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: A story of Kampung Kalut residents that is filled with conflicts. The residents frequently hold meetings about their problems with the Village Headman and Village Council no matter how silly the problem is.

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 1
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her. All his life, Luqman has always dreamed of becoming a pilot. But when he fails his exam, his plan was halted. He then decides to alter his result slip to make everyone believe that he passed. Proud of his son's achievement, Luqman's mother willingly agrees to propose Zia, the most sought after girl in the village, for him.

programme.title: Solo - EP 7
programme.desc: Host: Atyy MalekAty has always wanted to do volunteering job overseas. She heard about friends who volunteered in rural schools teaching English and other languages. In Colombo is where she also finds the Malays origin. This encourages the synergistic relationship between the locals and Host in the village itself.

programme.title: Mek Gyver - EP 8
programme.desc: Zara is a woman who enjoys doing repairs and will go out of the way to help others whenever they need something repaired - from pipes and computers to cars and farm machinery. Her good friend Aizul runs a repair service and persuades her to work with him. Zara agrees to Aizul's request to earn extra pocket money and to earn money to save a surau. When Izlan opens the same business and asks Zara to join him, she refuses and so the fight begin.

programme.title: Patah Sayap Bertongkat Paruh - EP 14
programme.desc: Aliah's life was devastated when Along and Achu insists that she reconcile with Hisyam. She regrets not choosing Talhah 15 years ago but instead marries Hisyam to fulfill her dreams. Though reluctant, Aliah has no choice but to reunite with Hisyam.

programme.title: O.M.G - EP 6
programme.desc: O.M.G is a light-hearted drama about three boys who swopped bodies after an experiment gone wrong. Soon, the boys will learn about their friend's race, culture and tradition. To top it all, the boys have been nominated to participate in a Racial Harmony competition. Watch this programme to see if the boys get back their bodies and if they win the competition.

programme.title: Secupak Harapan - EP 7
programme.desc: Host: Ainon TalibSecupak Harapan (Food for a Cause) is a food show with a lot of heart, where food is more than just a meal. It is about food representing different causes to different people. It may give someone a second chance in life, it may be a way of paying it forward and giving back to society.

programme.title: Jom Tengok - EP 1
programme.desc: Guest: Amar AsyrafRecipe:Durian Cheese CakeThis cooking series inform and guide audience on variety of exciting cake making and decoration. Guest celebrities are invited each week to bake and decorate the cake prepared with Chef Bunga.

programme.title: Realisasi Job Selebriti - EP 1
programme.desc: Realisasi Jon Selebriti is a variety & lifestyle reality show, where the celebrities will have the opportunity to experience his-her dream job or a job that they never thought of doing since they have become a celebrity. All episodes will feature excitement where celebrities need to learn and prepare tasks given related to the dream job and complete the given task spontaneously.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 19
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Impiana S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: This programme is a home decor makeover programme that focus on giving a new life to dull spaces such as bedroom, living room, and balcony and turn it into a new fresh modern space. It aims at doing a makeover for low cost apartment, flat and also village house. This season the host will share tips on DIY.

programme.title: Unplugged S5 - EP 11
programme.desc: 13 popular singers will perform in each episode their greatest hits plus other songs. Also included interview with them.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 1
programme.desc: After his divorce with Hani, Hanan is forced into an arranged marriage with Nawal by his mother. On the other hand, Nawal accepts her mother's suggestion to marry Hanan to hide her dark past. Hanan uses this opportunity to buy himself time to prove to Hani's family that he will change to become a better person for her and their daughter, Qalish. After divorcing Nawal, Hanan soon realises he is unable to live without her. Thus begins his quest to capture Nawal's heart and trust in him again.

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Sarawak - EP 1
programme.desc: Sarawak, also nicknamed 'Land of the Hornbills' is the largest state in Malaysia, with Muslims forming the second largest religious group after Christians. In this latest Salam Ramadan Borneo series, we visit Sarawak's capital city, Kuching and other exotic locations.

programme.title: Percaya Lagi - EP 6
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Nora and her husband are from a low-income family. Although both have full time jobs, they struggle financially to bring up their 3 young children. When they receive keys to their new flat, the couple makes the mistake of taking up a renovation loan, which amounts to $16,000. On top of that, Nora is knee-high in debt as she is not able to manage her spending. Eventually, Nora could no longer keep up with monthly payments and daily expenses. After exhausting all avenues of borrowing money from friends and her sister, Nora turns to illegal moneylenders. When she starts receiving calls from moneylenders demanding payments, Nora becomes depressed and tries to commit suicide. How did Nora get out of this messy situation?

programme.title: Siruvargal Naangal - EP 5
programme.desc: Kids United on Siruvargal Naangal only on Vasantham!

programme.title: Get Fit with Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 2
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 23
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the foodies into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings a new flavour to their kitchen, different from the ones they are used to.

programme.title: Indian Beat 11 (HD) - EP 3
programme.desc: Indian Beat is a bilingual magazine show that serves as an excellent platform by featuring the activities and events organized by the various Indian ethnic organizations around Singapore.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe Oli 96.8 - EP 4
programme.desc: Catch your Favourite Oli 96.8 DJs, Ravi G & Haleema Live from the Radio Conty.

programme.title: Thiru Valluvan - EP 6
programme.desc: Vasantham brings to you a family drama with obvious shades of grey,leaps of fun and emotions.

programme.title: Sangamam
programme.desc: This film depicts the disputes between two forms of the musical professions. One being purely Classical (Carnatic) and the other being rural folk (Tamil Nadu folk)... See full summary Director: Suresh Krishna Stars:Manivannan, Rahman and Srividya.

programme.title: Super Samayal 4 - EP 6
programme.desc: Join Chef Ariffin and Arulzhagan in this episode of Super Samayal and learn how to make Olive Brinjal (Ratatouille) suitable for diabetics.

programme.title: Get Fit with Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 2
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.title: Velunatchi - EP 58
programme.desc: Velunachi, a young village girl decides to carry her father's lineage in Tamil martial art form, Silambam.

programme.title: Maethaavi - EP 3
programme.desc: Knowledge is wealth. The three schools competing in the 3rd quarter finals are here to show us how great a wealth it truly is. Brace yourselves for an exciting display of determination!

programme.title: Get Fit With Me - EP 2
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.desc: Tamil.com.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 23
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti.

programme.title: Uravugal Sangamam - EP 74
programme.desc: The story revolves around the three families, bound by love, hate, care, jealousy and how they eventually conquer it all together.

programme.title: Indian Beat 11 (HD) - EP 3
programme.desc: Indian Beat is a bilingual magazine show that serves as an excellent platform by featuring the activities and events organized by the various Indian ethnic organizations around Singapore.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 17
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Sakka Podu Podu Raja
programme.desc: Santa earns the enmity of Bhavani, a gangster, when he helps his friend elope with Bhavani's sister. Santa soon falls in love with a girl, who turns out to be Bhavani's younger sister.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 17
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Vasantham Cafe S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bukit Batok Baby & Potong Pasir Papa gets overwhelmed as two unexpected gossips aunties visits the Caf and creates a ruckus! Meanwhile, several exciting songs and dance performance awaits including an astounding Anirudh mash-up by Abrahaam and Suma!

programme.title: Thalaimurai - National Day Telemovie - EP 1
programme.desc: Paneer, Khalid and Heng are very good friends who are part of the pioneer generation. They are still working hard to contribute to the community. However, Paneer is heart-broken when his grandson has no plans to stay in Singapore.

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Sirippu 2016 - EP 2
programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.title: Adimai Penn
programme.desc: An evil man kills Vengaiyan's father and enslaves all his people. Vengaiyan is ignorant and wild but Jeeva helps him evolve into a valiant and wise man, who then swears to right his people.

programme.title: Lukka Chupi
programme.desc: "Luka Chuppi" is the story of Guddu a television reporter in Mathura, who falls in love with a headstrong woman Rashmi. Guddu proposes marriage and Rashmi suggests Live In. What happens when they decide to live in, but the whole traditional family joins in too? That's what Guddu and Rashmi are going to find out, in this Romantic comedy film.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 18
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Queen - EP 3
programme.desc: The first season of Queen, comprising 11 episodes, chronicles the life of Shakthi Seshadri from the age of 14 to 40. In the process, she becomes the state topper in school, a celebrated actress and one of the most sought-after politicians in the state.

programme.title: Kazhugu 2
programme.desc: Kazhugu 2 is a 2019 Indian Tamil-language comedy thriller film written and directed by Sathyasiva, starring Krishna Sekhar and Bindu Madhavi in lead roles. It is the sequel to the 2012 film, Kazhugu. Produced by singaravelan under the banner madhukkoor films. The music composed by Yuvan Shankar Raj.

programme.title: Vanakkam Singai - EP 16
programme.desc: "Vanakkam Singai" - is an amalgamation of indoor and outdoor segments within one programme to cater to general audience of multiple age groups. Making the transition from radio's weekday morning belt to television, "Vanakkam Singai" is a 1-hour Breakfast show that aims to kick start Sundays morning with a smile. The segments will comprise of quick breakfast demonstrations , lifestyle & wellness, light-hearted discussion topics that all households can relate to.

programme.title: Pithamagan
programme.desc: Starring Vikram Suriya Laila Sangeetha Simran.Music by Ilaiyaraaja.

programme.title: She Taxi
programme.desc: Devayani, a taxi driver, takes three college students on a trip to the hilly terrains of Coorg. However, this trip changes her life when she learns that these students are in search of a treasure.

programme.desc: Stars:Radha and Rajnikanth.

programme.title: Iron to the Core

programme.title: Blast Off

Accompanied by their fiancées, Lexi and Elsie, and a local guide, Bart, they fly to their first stop: Wardang Island.

programme.title: The Outer Reaches of 8-Bit
programme.desc: Discover how Konami and Sunsoft's bold musical choices pushed Japanese video game music forward. programme.title: Fact or Fiction
programme.desc: Film director Asif Kapadia presents four short films that blur the lines between documentary and fiction.
